MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA5 postcode area of Mauchline. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm to repair faulty electrical equipment on the overhead network at Glenshiel Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.38pm on Wednesday 28th October 2020.
